review: Today I have visiting first time in hospital. It's very good experience for me... I will be happy to see the doctor ... He speaking very friendliness ...I am so happy.

I have been a loyal patient of Dr. Aruldas for as long as I can remember, and my trust in his medical expertise has only grown over the years. His ability to diagnose and treat fevers with a single injection has always amazed me. Even when tablets were prescribed, they proved to be incredibly effective.

What sets Dr. Aruldas apart is not only his medical skill but also the well-organized and welcoming environment of his clinic. It's evident that he and his team are dedicated to providing healthcare that's not only effective but also affordable. In a world where healthcare costs can be a burden, Dr. Aruldas truly embodies the belief that 'health is wealth.'

I want to express my gratitude for the painless and successful treatments I've received throughout my life. Dr. Aruldas, you've made a significant positive impact on my health and well-being, and I'm sure many others feel the same way. Thank you for your dedication and commitment to improving lives through your medical practice.\
I felt somewhat relieved from wheezing problem, soon after I took the first dosage. Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I strongly recommend Dr Aruldas .****** *** ***** **** **** ********* *** ** *********  **** *I had couple of times abdominal pain where i had temporary medication through doctor and once i had severe pain and rushed to  hospital in Tnagar, Doctor mentioned might be kidney stones and have to test through and would cost around 10k asked me to come next day .but that time he has given temporary treatment and pain reduced for a while .but after an hour again got severe pain and through my friends suggestion i went to Aruldas doctor .doctor had checked abdomen and said not seems to be kidney stones better to have scan . so through scan got to know pain is due to ovulation happened . he given the medication for pain reduction . after i never got any pain. so thankfully i ended up in spending less amount with very good treatment . i would say few doctor around not providing the right suggestion or treatment and instead would need to spend more cost and ending up in wrong treatment. Be careful to choose right doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering with a small tumor on my leg, which gave me an immense pain and couldn't walk... Visited here, doctor literally cleaned the tumor (I was literally crying as I couldn't bear the pain as my infection spread all over toe and swelled too). Doctor asked to bear for few mins, so I had to as I don't have any choice. The very next day i.e. after 12 hrs of his treatment, I could believe my eyes as the swelling has drastically reduced and I was able to walk. Surely I'll refer Dr. Benedict to my people.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Good.. But the reception should be maintained properly. They have written  my name wrongly as nasir. Sometimes they are checking the bp and temperature sometimes not taking, every time using phone in front of the reception talking together one of the patient waiting for injection.. No one cares and let the patient wait for injection. Then receptionist told a nurse to make injection... Some lethargic conditions are there in the hospital.. Kindly maintain it. Thanks.

review:
First, Dr. Benedict Aruldas listening what we try to say and then he response then he act in his prescription. His way of speech also good with smiling response.
Second, He touches the patients. Now a days doctors use gloves or some of the doctors not touches the patients. Most of the patients are expecting those two thing from doctors.
The next is Medicines, He writes correct medicines. Medicines response take maximum 3 days. He genuinely said "No need to visit after 3 or 4 days".
The next is Consulting fees, Its a nominal fees, it uses for poor people too. My over all experience with doctor is too good.
